mapper.sql: ID as id, CODE as code, DESCRIPTION as description, END_TIME as endTime, GIFT_QUOTA as giftQuota, PRO_AMOUNT as proAmount, PRO_AMOUNT2 as proAmount2, PRO_TYPE as proType, START_TIME as startTime, STATUS as status, VERSION as version, MST_SKU_ID as mstSkuId, SKU_ID as skuId, SHOP_ID as shopId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ma_vmi_timed_promotion ( id, CODE , DESCRIPTION , END_TIME , GIFT_QUOTA , PRO_AMOUNT , PRO_AMOUNT2 , PRO_TYPE , START_TIME , STATUS , VERSION , MST_SKU_ID , SKU_ID , SHOP_ID ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{code,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{description,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{endTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{giftQuota,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{proAmount,javaType=java.math.BigDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{proAmount2,javaType=java.math.BigDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{proType,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{startTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{status,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{version,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{mstSkuId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{skuId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{shopId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ma_vmi_timed_promotion SET CODE = #{code,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DESCRIPTION = #{description,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , END_TIME = #{endTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , GIFT_QUOTA = #{giftQuota,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , PRO_AMOUNT = #{proAmount,javaType=java.math.BigDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , PRO_AMOUNT2 = #{proAmount2,javaType=java.math.BigDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , PRO_TYPE = #{proType,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , START_TIME = #{startTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , STATUS = #{status,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , VERSION = #{version,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , MST_SKU_ID = #{mstSkuId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , SKU_ID = #{skuId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , SHOP_ID = #{shopId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE ID = #{id}
